items.content_html: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.
items.title: mini-360/LinkShortner: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for form validation. Ensure data integrity on the client side with real-time validation, custom error messages, and support for various input types. Easily integrate this library into your web projects to enhance user experience and streamline form submissions.
items.title: Princess-Morris/js-form-validation: A lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for form validation. Ensure data integrity on the client side with real-time validation, custom error messages, and support for various input types. Easily integrate this library into your web projects to enhance user experience and streamline form submissions.
